---
name: Feature proposal
about: Propose a new ingestion, note-taking, screening, or dashboard capability for ADOIF.
title: "[FEAT] "
labels: ["enhancement"]
assignees: []
---

## Problem / opportunity
Which user (student, clinician, admissions reviewer) needs this and why? Describe the workflow gap.

## Proposed solution
Detail the experience: CLI syntax, dashboard flows, data schema, or automation steps.

## Definition of done
- [ ] Acceptance criteria captured
- [ ] Tests / demo assets updated
- [ ] Docs / quickstart mention the change

## Dependencies / blockers
List related issues, third-party APIs, or design reviews.

## Additional notes
Link to mockups, research notes, Looms, or spreadsheets that informed the request.
